Name: Bioko Norte
Description: Bioko Norte is a region in the northern part of Bioko Island, which includes the country s capital, Malabo. It is the most urbanized region and the center of economic and political activity.

Name: Bioko Sur
Description: Bioko Sur is located in the southern part of Bioko Island, known for its tropical climate and mountainous terrain. The region is sparsely populated compared to the northern part.

Name: Centro Sur
Description: Centro Sur is a region on the mainland of Equatorial Guinea, known for its agricultural activities and small villages. It is an important area for the country s local economy.

Name: Litoral
Description: Litoral is a coastal region that includes the city of Bata and the surrounding areas. It is known for its port activities and significant role in the country s commerce and industry.

Name: Woleu-Ntem
Description: Woleu-Ntem is located in the northern part of mainland Equatorial Guinea. The region is rich in natural resources, including timber and minerals, and is sparsely populated.
